text: Ann Curry (born November 19, 1956) is an American television journalist and personality. She co-hosted the Today Show on NBC from 1997 until 2012. She also anchored Dateline NBC from 2005 to 2011. Curry was born on the island of Guam. Her father is American and her mother is Japanese. They met while her father was serving in the United States Navy during the US occupation of Japan after World War II. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:American journalists Category:American television personalities Category:People from Guam Category:1956 births Category:Living people
title: Ann Curry
